title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not work consistently. To reproduce the issue: 1. Close all editors. 2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. 4. Notice that nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Close All Saved' option should close the file f1.txt since no changes have been made to it.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue with the 'Close All Saved' option to ensure it consistently closes all saved files when no changes have been made.
